subtitle: Convert your web application into an Android APK
appNameHelp: The name that will appear on the device
packageNameHelp: Recommended reverse domain format. We'll auto-generate this after you enter your website URL.
websiteUrlHelp: Optional: URL to your web application (used for favicon extraction)
uploadIconText: Click to upload or drag and drop
uploadIconFormats: PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP • Max 5MB • Recommended: 512x512px
uploadIconHelp: If no icon is uploaded, we'll try to fetch your website's favicon or use a default icon
advancedSettingsInfo: The following settings will be automatically configured with optimal defaults:
createReleaseHelp: Release builds are signed and optimized for distribution
keyPasswordHelp: If empty, keystore password will be used
buildStatusMessage: Please wait while we convert your web app to APK
buildSuccessMessage: Your Android app is ready for download
statusBarColorHelp: Choose the background color for the app's status bar, defaults to theme purple
buildFailedMessage: Something went wrong during the build process
helpStep1: Fill in basic information: Enter your app name, package name, and version
helpStep2: Upload an icon (optional): Upload a high-quality icon or let us fetch your website's favicon
helpStep3: Click "Build APK": Wait for the conversion process to complete
helpStep4: Download your APK: Install it on your Android device
helpPackageText: Use reverse domain notation like com.yourcompany.appname. This must be unique and follow Android naming conventions.
helpIconReq2: Supported formats: PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP
helpIconReq4: Square icons without extra padding or whitespace produce the best results.
helpInstallText: To install the APK on your Android device:
helpInstallStep1: Enable "Unknown sources" in your device settings
aboutDescription: Web-to-APK is a powerful tool that converts web applications into native Android APK files. It uses modern web technologies and Android development tools to create high-quality mobile apps.
aboutFeature1: Convert any web app to Android APK
errorInvalidImageFile: Please select a valid image file (PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP)
errorFileTooLarge: File size must be less than 5MB
errorInvalidKeystoreFile: Please select a valid keystore file (.keystore or .jks)
errorInvalidPackageName: Invalid package name format. Use format like com.example.app
errorPackageNameJavaKeyword: Package name contains Java keywords (like "final", "class", etc.). Please use different names.
errorInvalidVersion: Version must be in format X.Y.Z (e.g., 1.0.0)
errorKeystoreFileRequired: Keystore file is required for release builds
errorKeystorePasswordRequired: Keystore password is required for release builds
errorKeyAliasRequired: Key alias is required for release builds
buildStageBuildingApkProgress: Compiling APK, this may take a few minutes...
error.javaKeyword: Package name contains Java reserved keywords. Please use different names for package components.
error.outOfMemory: Build failed due to insufficient memory. Try using the low-memory configuration or upgrade your system memory.
error.networkDependency: Failed to download build dependencies. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.gradleDaemon: Gradle daemon process failed. This is usually a temporary issue - please try building again.
error.sdkMissing: Android SDK components are missing or not properly configured. Please check your development environment.
error.buildGeneric: Build process failed. Please check the error details and try again.
error.networkConnection: Network connection failed. Please check your internet connection.
error.serverResponse: Server returned an invalid response. Please try again.
